name.content: The Marble Arch Hotel, by Thistle

description.content: The Marble Arch Hotel offers a unique experience in an outstanding central London location, just steps from Oxford Street. With Regent Street, Hyde Park, Marylebone, and numerous other landmarks nearby, it's ideal for business trips or leisure stays. Enjoy absolute comfort and impeccable service alongside excellent facilities, modern rooms, and expert staff. Nearly 700 bright, modern, and spacious bedrooms await, complemented by a highly recommended restaurant, Archy's Bar, a deli, and 12 fully equipped meeting rooms, including a beautiful ballroom. Fast, free, and unlimited Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel.
Includes 4-star hotels, 4-superior and 4 de luxe, boutiques, villas, historic hotels, rural hotels, lodges, farmhouses, resorts and portuguese pousadas.
